trans-unit.source:
\n

Specifies that a data field value in ASP.NET Dynamic Data must match the specified regular expression.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxx xxxx x xxxx xxxxx xxxxx xx XXX.XXX Xxxxxxx Xxxx xxxx xxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The regular expression that is used to validate the data field value.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxxx xx xxxxxxxx xxx xxxx xxxxx xxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets or set the amount of time in milliseconds to execute a single matching operation before the operation times out.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xx xxx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxx xx xxxxxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxx x xxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxx xxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The amount of time in milliseconds to execute a single matching operation.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xx xxxx xx xxxxxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxx x xxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Formats the error message to display if the regular expression validation fails.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xxxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The name of the field that caused the validation failure.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxx xxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Checks whether the value entered by the user matches the regular expression pattern.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xxxxxxx xx xxx xxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The data field value did not match the regular expression pattern.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xxxxx xxxxx xxx xxx xxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x
